snippet.title: Way of the Hunter - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A world of opportunity and adventure awaits! Way of the Hunter is coming soon to PC, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.

Explore vast, open hunting territories in America and Europe, experience realistic weapons and discover dozens of different animal species - alone or together with a friend. 

- Links & Info -
Steam: https://thqn.net/woth-steam
GOG: https://thqn.net/woth-gog
Epic Games Store: https://thqn.net/woth-egs
Website: http://wayofthehunter.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/wayofthehunter

- Our Socials -
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic
Twitter: https://twitter.com/THQNordic
Facebook: https://facebook.com/WayOfTheHunterGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wayofthehunter
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic

#WayOfTheHunter
